title: SBI forecasts GDP growth of 6.3%, lower than RBI's 6.6% estimate for FY25
description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has projected India's gross domestic product (GDP) would grow at 6.3% during the ongoing fiscal year (FY25), lower than the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) estimate of 6.6%, revised from the earlier 7.2%. India's GDP grew at 5.4% in the July-September quarter of FY25, the...
